Package com.anrisoftware.easycl.corejocl

EasyCL aim is to create an easy to use object oriented wrapper around OpenCL. It is inspired by the OpenCL C++ bindings. Short example taken from the test class CompileProgramTest. 
 def device = deviceFactory.create(platform)
 def context = contextFactory.create(platform, device)
 def queue = queueFactory.create(context, device)
 def updateGlobal = programFactory.create(context, """
 // Taken from the OpenCL C++ Bindings https://github.khronos.org/OpenCL-CLHPP/
 global int globalA;
 kernel void updateGlobal() {
     globalA = 75;
     printf("%d\\n", globalA);
 }
 """).buildProgram()
 updateGlobal.withCloseable {
     Kernel noargsKernel = kernelFactory.create(updateGlobal, "updateGlobal", [Arg.aint])
     noargsKernel.withCloseable {
         noargsKernel.enqueue(new EnqueueArgs(queue.get(), NDRange.d1Range(1))).call()
     }
 }
Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Erwin MÃ¼ller, <erwin@muellerpublic.de>
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BufferFactory
    Factory to create a new Supplier that supplies a cl_mem from the specified sources.
    CommandQueueFactory
    Factory to create a new Supplier that supplies a cl_command_queue for the specified platform and device.
    ContextFactory
    Factory to create a new Supplier that supplies a cl_context for the specified platform and device.
    DeviceFactory
    Factory to create a new Supplier that supplies a cl_device_id for the specified platform.
    HaveContext
    OpenCL object that is associated with a cl_context.
    HaveName
    OpenCL resource with a name.
    KernelFactory
    Factory to create a new Supplier that supplies a cl_kernel for the specified platform.
    PlatformFactory
    Factory to create a new Supplier that supplies a cl_platform_id.
    ProgramFactory
    Factory to create a new Supplier that supplies a cl_program from the specified sources.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Arg
    Wrapper around a kernel argument.
    Buffer
    Wrapper around cl_mem.
    CommandQueue
    Wrapper around cl_command_queue.
    Context
    Wrapper around cl_context.
    Device
    Wrapper around cl_device_id.
    EnqueueArgs
    Global work offsets, global work sizes, local work sizes.
    JoclModule  
    Kernel
    Wrapper around cl_kernel.
    NDRange
    NDRange values.
    Platform
    Wrapper around cl_platform_id.
    Program
    Wrapper around cl_program.
